view.callback

Class GameEngineCallbackGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.callback.GameEngineCallbackGUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameEngineCallback

    public class GameEngineCallbackGUI
extends java.lang.Object
implements GameEngineCallback
    The second GameEngineCallback, the origin of all GUI components. The methods of this class simply update the view (GameFrame) components.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean BUSTED 
      private boolean DEAL_ONGOING 
      private GameEngineSupport gameEngineSupport 
      private GameFrame gameFrame 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameEngineCallbackGUI(GameEngine gameEngine, int delay)
      The GUI related callback, updates the view based on the changes in the model.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void bustCard(Player player, PlayingCard card, GameEngine engine)
      Called when the card causes the player to bust.
      void houseBustCard(PlayingCard card, GameEngine engine)
      House's version of GameEngineCallback.bustCard(Player, PlayingCard, GameEngine).
      void houseResult(int result, GameEngine engine)
      Called when the house has bust with final result (result is score prior to the last card that caused the bust).
      void nextCard(Player player, PlayingCard card, GameEngine engine)
      Called for each card as the house is dealing to a Player, used to update display for each card or log to console.
      void nextHouseCard(PlayingCard card, GameEngine engine)
      Called as the house is dealing their own hand, used to update display for each card or log to console.
      void result(Player player, int result, GameEngine engine)
      Called after the player has bust with final result (result is score prior to the last card that caused the bust).

      • GameEngineCallbackGUI

        public GameEngineCallbackGUI(GameEngine gameEngine,
                             int delay)
        The GUI related callback, updates the view based on the changes in the model.
        Parameters:
        gameEngine - the GameEngine which plays the role of the model
        delay - the delay between cards being dealt

                     PlayingCard card,
                     GameEngine engine)
        Description copied from interface: GameEngineCallback
         Called for each card as the house is dealing to a Player, used to
 update display for each card or log to console.

        nextCard in interface GameEngineCallback
        Parameters:
        player - the Player who is receiving cards
        card - the next PlayingCard that was dealt

      • bustCard

        public void bustCard(Player player,
                     PlayingCard card,
                     GameEngine engine)
        Description copied from interface: GameEngineCallback
         Called when the card causes the player to bust.
 This method is called instead of GameEngineCallback.nextCard(Player, PlayingCard, GameEngine).
 This method is called before GameEngineCallback.result(Player, int, GameEngine).
 Used to update display for each card or log to console.
 Note: If player gets 42 exactly then this method is not called.
        Specified by:
        bustCard in interface GameEngineCallback
        Parameters:
        player - the Player who is receiving cards
        card - the bust card that was dealt
        engine - a convenience reference to the engine so the receiver can call methods if necessary

      • result

        public void result(Player player,
                   int result,
                   GameEngine engine)
        Description copied from interface: GameEngineCallback
         Called after the player has bust with final result (result is score prior
 to the last card that caused the bust).
 Called from GameEngine.dealPlayer(Player, int).
        Specified by:
        result in interface GameEngineCallback
        Parameters:
        player - the current Player
        result - the final score of the round
        engine - a convenience reference to the engine so the receiver can call methods if necessary

      • houseResult

        public void houseResult(int result,
                        GameEngine engine)
        Description copied from interface: GameEngineCallback
         Called when the house has bust with final result (result is score prior to the last card
 that caused the bust).
 Called from GameEngine.dealHouse(int).
 Note: This method should only be called after bets have been updated on all Players
 so this callback can log Player results.
        Specified by:
        houseResult in interface GameEngineCallback
        Parameters:
        result - the final score of the dealers (house) hand
        engine - a convenience reference to the engine so the receiver can call methods if necessary
